academy.mindswap.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • academy.mindswap.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for creating the server that will start a game and listen to players When a player arrives his socket will be sent to the available game If a game is already full and not accepting players it creates a new game to accept new players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server()
      Constructor method from Server class Creates a list that will hold the active games

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method of the class Server Accepts a port as an argument.
      void removeGameFromList(Game game)
      Removes a game from the gameList.
      void start(int port)
      Starts the server in the specified port If there is no game available for players to join creates a new one Waits for a client to connect to the server and add it to an available game

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()
        Constructor method from Server class Creates a list that will hold the active games

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method of the class Server Accepts a port as an argument. If no port is provided the default is 8080
        Parameters:
        args - the port to start the server

      • start

        public void start(int port)
           throws java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Starts the server in the specified port If there is no game available for players to join creates a new one Waits for a client to connect to the server and add it to an available game
        Parameters:
        port - the port that will accept client connections
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.RejectedExecutionException - the game thread couldn't start
        java.io.IOException - the server socket couldn't start

      • removeGameFromList

        public void removeGameFromList(Game game)
        Removes a game from the gameList. This method is invoked by the game itself
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to be removed.
